ModMetaData.name: RimDungeon Traps, Poisons and Gases
ModMetaData.author: miki4920
ModMetaData.description:
A mod from RimDungeon Series focusing on adding more traps. Whilst the content of the mod expands rapidly, at current time following are included: - Animal Traps: Noose traps to immobilise animals or Bear traps to kill them.
- Caltrops: Painful to step on, take a very long time to walk through.
- Spikes: A normal spike trap has been buffed and is now rearmable. There is also an improved version which does massive damage but costs way more resources.
- Faulty Columns: For when you really want to drop mountain on top of raiders.
- Poisons: Different variaties, ranging from Rage to Neurotoxin.
- Gases: Similar variety to poisons, with few extra such as Wall Gas to block passages in an emergency.
